paragraph: 24/7 Help: Call, Chat or email us if you’ve been hurt in an accident. Se habla español.Book Your Free Consultation

detailsData.title: Decades of Experience
detailsData.content: With more than six decades of successful results, the Frickey Law Firm has built a hard-earned reputation for excellence. Our extensive connection to the community has helped us become one of the most respected practices in the region.

detailsData.title: Award-Winning Team
detailsData.content: Our attorneys have earned an array of awards from several distinguished organizations, including AV rating from Martindale Hubble, Best Lawyers in America, and US News & World Report Top Law Firm.

detailsData.title: Personalized Approach
detailsData.content: We never take a one-size-fits-all approach to legal strategies. We know that the keys to success are rooted in meticulous preparation, hard work, and focused dedication to every single case.

detailsData.title: Community Support
detailsData.content: We have ardently supported local organizations and charities that enrich the lives of many Coloradans, including The Action Center, Jeffco Schools Foundation, and Mothers Against Drunk Driving (MADD).

subHeading: Lakewood, Colorado Personal Injury Lawyer Serving Denver, Boulder, and Nearby Areas
valueProp: For more than 50 years, personal injury attorneys at the Frickey Law Firm have served clients in personal injury cases throughout the Denver area. From injured workers to drivers who have been hurt in motor vehicle accidents, you can expect our lawyers to act as your voice and serve you and your family with skill and integrity.
CTA: 24/7 Help: Call, Chat or email us if you’ve been hurt in an accident. Se habla español.Book Your Free Consultation

testimonalData.text: I was in car accident about 2 years ago, and I had to hire a lawyer. I decided to go with the Frickey Law Firm. My case was kind complicated, but I was assigned Eric Ballou and he was really professional, helpful, knowledgeable and honest. He was able to get me a settlement for my case. I definitely recommend them the firm and specifically Eric Ballou to represent you.
testimonalData.author: Marco M

testimonalData.text: My father died in a motorcycle accident in October and Leigh helped me to sort through a very difficult process. I greatly appreciated her help and how hard she worked to find answers to my questions and make sure everything was done and done right.
testimonalData.author: Kayla H

testimonalData.text: The people at Frickey were wonderful to work with. From the first meeting ,they were understanding and concerned with my case. Once I decided to go with them they went to work on my case. The company they had to deal with was a bit difficult to say the least. It took a while to bring my case to an end but they kept me informed all the way. So if get your hurt at work an need help I would strongly advise you to have the Frickey law firm take a look at your case to see if they can help. They did a wonderful job for me.
testimonalData.author: Patrick U
